CustomField.description: Tracks the cumulative on-hold time. Tracker includes previously recorded on-hold time PLUS current on hold duration.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"On Hold (Pending User Input)"), Days_on_hold__c + (Now() - On_Hold_Since__c), 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tracks the cumulative on-hold time. Tracker includes previously recorded on-hold time PLUS current on hold duration.
CustomField.label: On Hold Time Tracker
